item.title: How North Carolina erased medical debt for 2.5 million people

item.title: Language learning marketplace Preply’s unicorn status embodies Ukrainian resilience
item.description: Language learning marketplace Preply is now valued at $1.2 billion after raising a $150 million that marks a new chapter for the 14-year-old company.

item.title: India’s app downloads rebounded to 25.5 billion in 2025, fueled by AI assistants and microdrama boom
item.description: ChatGPT was the second most downloaded app in India for 2025 after Instagram.

item.title: Consumers spent more on mobile apps than games in 2025, driven by AI app adoption
item.description: Consumers spent more money in mobile apps than games in 2025, driven by AI app adoption.

item.title: Legal battles over immigration enforcement operation in Minnesota intensify
item.description: Confrontations with federal officers over their massive immigration enforcement operation in Minnesota are showing no signs of stopping.

item.title: Snap reaches settlement in social media addiction lawsuit
item.description: Snap is still a defendant in similar cases related to social media addiction.

item.title: Amagi slides in India debut, as cloud TV software firm tests investor appetite
item.description: Amagi shares debuted at a 12% discount, offering an early read on investor demand for a rare type of tech listing in India.
